scripts.build:app:Calculator: cross-env APP_NAME=Calculator APP_ENTRY_SRC=apps/Calculator/App.jsx vite build --config vite.lib.config.js
scripts.build:app:Notes: cross-env APP_NAME=Notes APP_ENTRY_SRC=apps/Notes/App.jsx vite build --config vite.lib.config.js
scripts.build:app:Calendar: cross-env APP_NAME=Calendar APP_ENTRY_SRC=apps/Calendar/App.jsx vite build --config vite.lib.config.js
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:app:Calculator && npm run build:app:Notes && npm run build:app:Calendar
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:apps
